content:
Germany's postal service, Deutsche Post, is known for issuing high-quality stamps, and I'm sure the Galactic Odyssey set is no exception.

I'm glad I could help, and I hope you have a blast building your album and learning more about space exploration. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask.

Deutsche Post often issues stamps with unique designs and themes, so it's great that you've added the Galactic Odyssey set to your collection. Who knows, maybe one day you'll have a complete collection of German stamps featuring space-themed designs!

Good luck with your album, and happy collecting!
